mapper.sql: PUID, P_VEHICLE_NAME, P_VEHICLE_PERTAIN_TO_PLATFORM, P_VEHICLE_CREATE_DATE, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MOD_DATE, P_VEHICLE_CODE, P_VEHICLE_SHAPE_CODE, P_VEHICLE_TRAN_NAME, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL_CODE, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MODIFIER
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_VEHICLE_RECORD ( PUID, P_VEHICLE_NAME, P_VEHICLE_PERTAIN_TO_PLATFORM, P_VEHICLE_CREATE_DATE, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MOD_DATE, P_VEHICLE_CODE, P_VEHICLE_SHAPE_CODE, P_VEHICLE_TRAN_NAME, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL_CODE, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MODIFIER ) values ( #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehiclePertainToPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pVehicleLastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pVehicleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleTranName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleAnnualCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleAnnual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pVehicleLastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update HZ_VEHICLE_RECORD set P_VEHICLE_NAME = #{pVehicleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MOD_DATE = #{pVehicleLastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_VEHICLE_CODE = #{pVehicleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_SHAPE_CODE = #{pVehicleShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_TRAN_NAME = #{pVehicleTranName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL_CODE = #{pVehicleAnnualCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_ANNUAL = #{pVehicleAnnual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_VEHICLE_LAST_MODIFIER = #{pVehicleLastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
